column5: We fish up in Quebec every year at Lac Nilgaut (above Deep River). But we're looking for something not as far up. Does anyone have a recommendation for a great fishing camp? Want to have a cabin on the water, plus boats to rent. Lake trout lake a bonus.  Thanks!
Just takes a little research on the intra-net and im sure you will find what you are looking for. Theres gotta be a couple hundread spots. P.S. Welcome to the board.
